text: Simon James Greenall (born 3 January 1958) is an English actor, producer, writer and voice artist. He portrayed Michael in the BBC television series I Am Alan Partridge, as well as in Alan Partridge: Alpha Papa, the caretaker in the CBBC game show Trapped!, Richard in Lucy Sullivan is Getting Married and various roles in television comedies such as Harry Enfield & Chums, Armstrong and Miller, Alas Smith & Jones, The Impressions Show with Culshaw and Stephenson and Benidorm. ==Other websites== * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English television producers Category:English television writers Category:English voice actors
title: Simon Greenall
